ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Finance of GREG STEWART, of Regina, Saskatchewan, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 29, 2020.
